name: Set Story Width on Various Fanfiction Websites
description:
Once again, this is a very simple script that changes the width of a story on a number of Fan Fiction websites.

This script is for fanficauthors.net, tthfanfic.org, hpfandom.net, and tenhawkpresents.com at present.

Edit - Added Spacebattles.com, YourFanfiction.com, Stardestroyer.net, ArchiveOfOurOwn.com and Ficwad.com.
Edit - Added E-Fic.com.
additional_info:
I find 600px to be a comfortable reading size, but if you don't just change the 600px to a size that you feel comfortable with.

If you don't want this script affecting a specific site, then delete the "@-moz-document domain("domain"){ code }"  bit for the website you don't want to affect.
